strings:
<voice_0x01001324><se_def>Marek: Have they been waiting for me!?
There are so many of them...

<voice_0x01001325><se_def>Marek: Be careful!
These are no normal wolves!
<voice_0x01001327><se_def>Marek: Why do they come for me like this!?

<voice_0x01001329><center>He is not the one.
<center>I sense sage's blood, but it is not him.

<voice_0x0100132A><center>There must be another...
<center>We must find the chosen heir of the sage.

<voice_0x0100132B><se_def>Marek: What...what was that voice!?
And what does it mean by the ‘chosen heir’?

<voice_0x0100132C><se_def>Marek: I cannot understand.
It cannot be real...
